name: Thin and Crispy Pizza Crust

instructions.en: Preheat the oven to 450°F (230°C). Line a 16-inch pizza pan with parchment paper or nonstick foil.
instructions.sk: Predhrejte rúru na 230°C. Vyložte 40 cm pizzovú formu papierom na pečenie alebo nepriľnavou fóliou.
instructions.ja: オーブンを450°F（230°C）に予熱します。16インチ（約40cm）のピザ用の天板にパーチメント紙またはノンスティックホイルを敷きます。

instructions.en: In a mixing bowl, combine shredded mozzarella, cheddar cheese, eggs, garlic powder, and basil (if using). Mix well.
instructions.sk: V miske zmiešajte strúhanú mozzarellu, čedar, vajcia, cesnakový prášok a bazalku (ak používate). Dobre premiešajte.
instructions.ja: ボウルにシュレッドしたモッツァレラチーズ、チェダーチーズ、卵、ガーリックパウダー、バジル（使用する場合）を入れてよく混ぜます。

instructions.en: Spread the cheese mixture evenly on the prepared pizza pan, almost to the edge, making it as thin as possible.
instructions.sk: Syrovou zmesou rovnomerne potrite pripravenú pizzovú formu, takmer až po okraj, čo najtenšie.
instructions.ja: チーズの混合物を準備したピザ用の天板に、端までできるだけ薄く均一に広げます。

instructions.en: Bake for 15-20 minutes until golden brown. Check after 10 minutes; if edges are darkening too quickly, reduce temperature to 400°F (200°C) and continue baking until brown all over.
instructions.sk: Pečte 15-20 minút, kým nezhnedne. Po 10 minútach skontrolujte; ak okraje príliš rýchlo tmavnú, znížte teplotu na 200°C a pečte ďalej, kým nebude celé hnedé.
instructions.ja: 15〜20分間、きつね色になるまで焼きます。10分後に確認し、端が早く焦げすぎる場合は温度を400°F（200°C）に下げ、全体が茶色くなるまで焼き続けます。

instructions.en: Remove from oven and pat off any excess grease.
instructions.sk: Vyberte z rúry a osušte prebytočný tuk.
instructions.ja: オーブンから取り出し、余分な油を拭き取ります。

instructions.en: Add your choice of toppings. It's recommended to pre-cook vegetables and meats before adding them to the pizza.
instructions.sk: Pridajte toppingy podľa vášho výberu. Odporúča sa zeleninu a mäso pred pridaním na pizzu predvariť.
instructions.ja: お好みのトッピングを追加します。野菜や肉は事前に調理してからピザに乗せることをお勧めします。

instructions.en: Place the pizza under the broiler (with the oven rack in the center position) for 4-5 minutes, until toppings are hot and any added cheese is melted and bubbly.
instructions.sk: Vložte pizzu pod gril (s roštom rúry v strednej polohe) na 4-5 minút, kým nebudú toppingy horúce a pridaný syr sa neroztopí a nebude bublať.
instructions.ja: ピザをオーブンの中央の棚に置き、グリル（ブロイラー）で4〜5分間、トッピングが熱くなり、追加したチーズが溶けて泡立つまで焼きます。

notes: This Thin and Crispy Pizza Crust is a low-carb alternative to traditional pizza crust. It's made primarily of cheese, making it high in protein and very low in carbohydrates. The recipe makes 8 servings and can be frozen for later use. For best results, pre-cook your toppings before adding them to the pizza, as the final broiling time is brief. This crust can be used as a base for any of your favorite pizza toppings, making it a versatile option for keto dieters.
